snippet: Sprint said the addition of more wireless devices to its network helped it shrink its fourth-quarter loss.
abstract: Sprint says addition of net 477,000 wireless devices to its network helped it shrink its fourth-quarter loss; posts loss of $1.04 billion, or 26 cents a share, compared with loss of $1.32 billion, or 44 cents a share, a year before.
lead_paragraph: Sprint said the addition of more wireless devices to its network helped it shrink its fourth-quarter loss.

headline.main: Sprint Posts Smaller Loss Than Was Expected
headline.print_headline: Sprint Posts Smaller Loss Than Was Expected
